Why Workforce Planning is Important during Hard times
Why Workforce Planning is
Important during Hard times

Myth: My key talent won’t desert me because they have nowhere to go.
Myth: My key talent won’t desert
me because they have nowhere
to go.

Fact: Loyalty is always hard to find
Fact: Loyalty is always hard
to find

Fact: Filling the talent pipeline is critical in all economic cycles
Fact: Filling the talent pipeline is
critical in all economic cycles

Myth: Career and development plans should take a back seat
Myth: Career and development
plans should take a back seat

engage employees and increase
